Text: Thank you for this!  I've been looking for it for years.  I'm seeding.

I don't see any AVI files in here.
Just a bunch of those same damned .rar files.

Will try not to have to download this version, because if I do, I sure as hell am not seeding it - I have no good reason to keep two copies on the hard drive.

Also, for files under 1GB, there is absolutely no legitimate reason to use RAR for a torrent in the first place. This isn't usenet for crying out loud.

@ Tropius__B:
